reviews.comments: Muy comodo el departamento y la ubicación ideal. Muy recomendable alojarse en lo de Guido. El dia de salida nos guardo el equipaje hasta el horario que necesitabamos, muy atento. Gracias.

Excelente experiencia, nos alojaríamos en el departamento de Guido cada vez que viajemos a Buenos Aires. Realmente las fotos de su publicación son exactamente como en la realidad. Excelente vista y el departamento muy moderno.
Fuimos 2 parejas y la pasamos genial. Excelente ubicación a 10 cuadras de Plaza Serrano.
Un detalle que agrego valor a la estadía, al lado del edificio está Cervecería Nacional, imposible no hacer una parada antes de subir al depto para tomar una RED IPA. Si bien hay movimiento en la puerta mientras esta abierto el bar, NO se escuchan ruidos.
En fin, 5 estrellas se lleva este departamento ubicado en la zona de Palermo.
Excelente Anfitrión. Guido estuvo atento desde el primer contacto hasta el final de nuestra estadía. Lindísimo el departamento y muy buena ubicación. Muy recomendable. !!
Confortable, seguro, buena ubicación, lugar tranquilo, con todos los elementos para pasar buenos momentos en el departamento.

El departamento es de categoría tal cual puede verse en las fotos de la publicación. De excelencia la atención de Guido, siempre predispuesto a nuestras necesidades. La ubicación es inmejorable y muy tranquilo. Super recomendable para disfrutar de unos días en Buenos Aires.
Muy lindo y luminoso el departamento, ubicación ideal para salir a pasear y comer en familia. Era justamente lo que estábamos buscando!
El depto esta muy bueno. Mucha luz con sus 3 balcones.  Muy comodo. La zona es tremenda. Mucha vida nocturna. Bares y restaurantes.
EXCELENTE !!!!!!
Excelente!!! Siempre que vaya a Bs As y esté disponible ahí iré!!!
Todo bárbaro! Guido fue sumamente amable, y el departamento tal cual se ve en las fotos. Gracias!!

La ubicación es perfecta, en la mejor ubicación de Palermo. Las fotos son tal cual la realidad. El departamento está lleno de luz y aire, con muy lindas vistas. Guido es un gran anfitrión, que enseguida te hace sentir que llegas a la casa de un amigo.
Perfect location, in the best part of Palermo. The apartment is just as shown in the pictures. The apartment is airy and full of sun with great views. Guido is a great host, and right away you feel very welcome.

Nos encantó nuestra corta estadía donde Guido! Pasamos solo nos noches mientras esperábamos que terminen de llegar el resto de nuestro grupo para pasarnos a una casa grande. Pero nos encantó el departamento.. está muy lindo decorado, la vista de los balcones es increíble, muy bien ubicado, la panadería que tiene justo abajo es deliciosa, en fin.. todo positivo! Guido muy atento.. lo que más nos gustó fue que en la mesa de la sala hay una carpeta, folletos, libros con todo tipo de información útil para turistas.. desde números de taxis a recomendaciones para restaurantes y muchas cosas más. Esos detalles que hacen la diferencia.. 
Fue nuestra primera experiencia en Airbnb y nos gustó mucho!

Fue mi primer experiencia en Airbnb, acostumbrada a quedarme en hoteles de categoría y la verdad que el apto es super recomendable. 
Zona tranquila y segura. A 15 minutos a pie de plaza serrano y todos los bares y a unas pocas cuadras de excelentes restoranes.
Abajo hay una bakery con cosas riquisimas donde venden yerba canarias (importante para los uruguayos que viajan sin yerba!!)
El apartamento muy funcional, cómodo y bien limpio!
Volveremos!
Un apartamento bien equipado, acogedor y en un lugar muy tranquilo, 100% recomendable.

Excelente Depto! Gran ubicación cerca de locales de todo tipo, comida, restaurantes, bares, cafés, etc. Todo se puede hacer caminando. Muy cómodo, buenas terminaciones y acogedor. Vista panorámica espectacular desde todos lados y muy luminoso. Guido estuvo siempre atento y disponible a cualquier cosa y con una gran disposición. Llegamos muy temprano y nos ofreció todas las facilidades para dejar maletas y entrar lo antes posible. Definitivamente vuelvo la próxima vez que esté por Bs As.
Muy lindo el lugar

Un aplauso por Guido! Nos escribio como encontrar el apto. y nos recomiendo una pasteleria en la esquina para desayunar ... el apto. era limpio y igual a las fotos! Guido estaba a las ordenes 24h por cualquier duda q tuvimos- es de verdad un super houst! Gracias Guido!
Muy amable el dueño de casa, solucionó cualquier pequeño percance y facilitó nuestra estadía. El apartamento muy lindo. Los cuartos chicos pero todo perfecto!
Muy buen departamento y excelente ubicacion. Recomendable

Guido fue un bárbaro anfitrión. Ayudando nos con el taxi cuando hubo una huelga em BA em aeropuerto. Su departamiento és muy lindo e muy cómodo, ubicado en una región rebuena, llena de bares, restaurantes hermosos e exquisitos y muchos boliches. Guía sus huespedes en el mejor del barrio todo escrito en el departamiento. Por último fue excelente experiencia.

Precioso apto, sus fotos describen tal cual su apariencia. El barrio tambien muy lindo y tranquilo lleno de restoranes, pubs y locales de diseño. Precioso para investigarlo, caminarlo y dejarse sorprender. 
Guido una maravilla! Muy atento y dispuesto a ayudarte a tener una mejor estadia. 
Lo recomiendo! Vale la pena!
Excelente ubicación.  Excelente trato. El apartamento está tan bien equipado que nunca nos falto nada.
Excelente ubicación en el corazón de Palermo, muy comodo con vista espectacular.
El apartamento esta miy correcto tal y como esta en la fotos. Quiza aparenta un poco mas de lo que es

Super recomendable. Muy buena atención y detalles que nos hicieron sentir muy cómodos y como en casa.
El departamento esta muy limpio y tiene muy buenas vistas de la ciudad. Muy lindo en general. Muchas gracias por todo.
El departamento es muy agradable y acogedor. La descripción del mismo coincide con el lugar. Guido es muy amable y ha estado presto a brindarnos recomendaciones para nuestra estadía.

El sitio y la atención de Guido y la zona hicieron que disfrutará mi estancia. El PH es lindo y funcional, la ubicación y zona magníficas y nuestro anfitrión Guido l mar de gentil. Además el entorno es delicioso para comer y cenar. Guido es un gran orientador y le agradezco. Manuel Meneses

Guido es un anfitrión inmejorable. Siempre bien dispuesto, cordial y absolutamente adorable. El departamento es hermoso con todas las comodidades que uno espera encontrar para sentirse como en casa. Hasta el último momento estuvo pendiente de nosotros. Gracias Guido siempre es un placer conocer personas como tu que son la imagen de un hermoso país. Con seguridad querré volver.

pasamos unos dias muy lindos en buenos aires!! el departamento esta muy bien ubicada y tiene 2 balcones y una teraza con una vista espectacular! hay que ir al "mercado de las pulgas" (que  esta cerca), donde se puede encontrar antigüedades muy lindos! hay unos restaurantes y cafes buenos en los alrededores. guido es muy simpatico y solícito y habla ingles perfecto!
muchas gracias por todo!!

Guido ha sido un excelente anfitrion, su departamento es tal cual esta en las fotos, muy bonito y bien ubicado. Recomiendo esa estadia a quien quiera conocer una linda zona de la ciudad de Buenos Aires. Las recomendaciones de restaurantes y tiendas cercanas que nos paso Guido fueron aprobadas por toda la familia.
An excellent stay!
Guido was very friendly and helpful and so was Julio. I would definitely book his place again. It was immaculately clean and very accurate to the pictures.

Great place. Stayed there with my brother and our elderly parents. Aside from both bedrooms being on the upper floor (tricky for my father), I have no complaints. Excellent location, super responsive/helpful host, and beautiful balconies both in the apartment and on the roof. All of Palermo is easily accessible by foot. Would stay again.
This apartment has a great view and all restaurant are really close. Located in a nice area.

Awesome host, awesome place and wonderful time overall. Great location close to Palermo Soho and short walk from subway. Easy to get around. Lots of stores nearby so staying there was easy. Would do it again in a heartbeat!
Guido was very welcoming and helpful. The apartment was cost, well equipped, and centrally located. We highly recommend it.

I would highly recommend staying in this apartment. It is spacious, comfortable, and located in the middle of a wide range of excellent bars, restaurants, and cafes. Guido is a responsive and very helpful host. 

And if you like Italian food, there’s a restaurant called Cucina Paradiso a few doors down that you absolutely cannot skip.

The apartment was lovely, welk located in BA’s hippest area, with a bakery, 2 supermarkets and a cafe within 2 mins walking distance from the flat. The area is very safe, full of young people, bars and restaurants. Guido was an amazing host all round, very responsive, pleasant and helpful. Would definetely recommend it!

Great apartment, great host, great neighborhood - what more can I say. Guido was a great host in touch with us and helping resolve issues and give us good (fun) advice for sightseeing and dining. Would highly recommend to other travelers!
Mike

Guido is a terrific host & his place is terrific! It is in Palermo, in a wonderful part of this vibrant city. Cafes, bars & restaurants are on every corner. Everything is easy to get to, and again, Guido was a great host!

Guido waited for us at the apartment and gave us a tour of the place (and the rooftop pool!) in addition to some great tipps. The apartment is very stylish, has lots of light and an incredible view of the city (as in the pictures). The location is perfect as well, with many restaurants, bars, bakeries etc within walking distance. We were lucky enough to have sunny days, so we could check out the nice rooftop pool as well. Highly recommended, great host and great place!
Simply amazing place.  Close to amazing restaurants and Guido was an awesome host

Very nice flat with an amazing view! It's located in a quiet part of Palermo but very close to the trendy and lively Palermo Soho. We stayed with one couple and one other guest and we had more than enough space. The flat was very clean and Guido was very helpfull. Will stay here again for sure!

Palermo is the place to be in BA. Cafes, Bars and Restaurants everywhere. Super nice apartment and Guido was supportive from the beginning to the end. 5 stars, nothing to complain even if we Germans find always something . But not in this case! Perfect
We had a great time at Guido's place! Everything was great!

A great apartment in a great neighborhood.  The apartment is exactly as you see in photos. Spacious, clean, convenient neighbourhood. Guido is easy to communicate with and immediately answered any concerns we had. He even organised our taxi on the last day. Apartment is in a great neighborhood,close to subway, restaurants and cafes. Neighborhood fairly quiet and safe. Thanks again for  great stay Guido!
Guido was very welcoming and his apartment was perfect for our short stay - would recommend!

O apartamento é espetacular! Fomos em 4 mulheres e a estadia não poderia ter sido melhor. O Guido nos deu ótimas sugestões de lugares para conhecermos no bairro.

Obrigada por abrir sua casa pra gente!

Such a fantastic location when visiting Buenos Aires for a week.  We were close to great restaurants, bars and cafes and the short walk to subway stations and bus stops meant easy access to all tourist attractions. Walking around the neighbourhood felt safe, friendly and welcoming.  Great breakfast pastries from next door but one and across the road!  Guido was the perfect host and check in informative with excellent communications before arrival.  Loved this stay :)

Guido is an excellent host who went out of his way to ensure we had a positive experience. His apartment is exactly as pictured, and is ideally located in the heart of upscale Palermo. I would not hesitate to recommend this rental unit to anyone considering a visit.

Beautiful spacious 2-floor apartment in Palermo.  Lots of room for the 4 of us during our stay.  Guido is an excellent host and really was proactive with getting us settled and when an issue arose he was quick to fix it.  Beds are comfortable.   Views are awesome for sunrise and the 10 minute walk to the Subte was easy and essential for getting around the city.   Would recommend!

This is a beautiful home away from home--centrally located, nearby a myriad of restaurants and bars. Guido is an excellent host--attentive and responsive to all communication. I will definitely be keeping this place in mind the next time I visit Buenos Aires.

This was one of the best AirBnB places I've stayed at. The condo is very modern looking and something I would want to live in permanently if I made more money ;)

The condo was more than spacious enough for me and my buddy. Since it is located in Palermo, you are within walking distance to very good restaurants and a very active nightlife. The portenos definitely know how to party all night long.

The check-in process was very smooth despite us getting there way before check-in time. We were able to rest up and take a shower in the lounge area on the top floor Julio, the security guard at the building, was very helpful and friendly. Guido was an awesome host. He was very communicative before and during the stay. We got to meet him during check-in and naturally he was super friendly and helpful. There is even a mini-guidebook in the condo with helpful information and his local recommendations.

A great stay and if I'm ever in Buenos Aires again, which is very likely, I would definitely stay with Guido again. A+++

If you are looking for the perfect place to stay in Buenos Aires this is it! Palermo Hollywood is THE place to be. Guidos place is beautiful (just as you see in the photos), central and has everything you need for your stay. He is a lovely host and very easy to communicate with. He even organized our airport drop off on our last day! We hope to stay here again if we return to Buenos Aires in the future.

Guido's apartment is beautiful, comfortable, and located in a great neighborhood with a fabulous panaderia right downstairs. There are also 3 terraces overlooking the city. Guido was incredibly helpful with any questions we had and very available. And he leaves a large bottle of water and carton of orange juice on the counter when you arrive. We loved staying there and would definitely want to stay again when we come back to Buenos Aires! This is the fourth apt we stayed in in Buenos Aires, and it was by far the best.

Adoramos o espaço, a localização e atendimento do Guido.
Super recomendo

Thank you Guido for your amazing hospitality.
The house is clean and comfortable, located in a such beautiful area with a open sunrise. 
Easy to find, easy for check-in and check-out.

Lots of plusses - Key fob security access, modern decor, decent speed wifi, stunning views from the balconies, quiet, really well located for bars and restaurants. 

Guido is a really great host - he speaks excellent English, has produced a very good guide for local places to eat and drink, and is always available if you need him. He even booked our airport taxi for us.    Top man! Muchas gracias Guido!
Excellent place to stay....
Localização e apartamento incríveis. No coração de Palermo, fácil acesso ao metrô, perto de ótimos bares e restaurantes. O lugar é ótimo e a atenção de Guido é (URL HIDDEN) certeza voltarei!
Guido foi extremamente atencioso conosco desde o primeiro contato. Seu apartamento é de extremo bom gosto e a vista é absolutamente espetacular. Alem disso a localização é fantastica.

Guidos place was fabulous. We came from Chile and booked the place on short notice. The views of the city were spectacular. The place was extremely clean, functional and accommodating. We were impressed with the rooftop balcony and community grill and pool and the private balcony for having coffee and tea in the morning was an over the top amenity. Great value and guido was respectful of our privacy but also attentive if we needed anything. He let us keep our bags with security while we toured around the city for a couple of hours before our flight. Great stay for an extremely great value. The surrounding area was beautiful and we loved Crisol, an upscale breakfast/brunch place across the street. I would love to stay there again! Gracias Por todo Guido.

I would recommend this apartment.  It is in a good neighbourhood, close to small shops, coffee places and in walking distance to public transport.
Great view over the city, best sunrise  ever.
The owner is very nice and available to answer all your inquiries.
Will be back with pleasure.
Accueil très chaleureux de la part de Guido. Appartement lumineux et bien placé . Très belle vue sur Buenos Aires.

Très bel appartement, lumineux , confortable, bien situé. 
Guido est un hôte charmant.

Great place in Palermo Hollywood.
Do not hesitate to book as it is even better than the pictures suggest.
And Guido is a very nice host. Everything is waking distance from the penthouse.
Guido is an excellent host and neighborhood was awesome!

If you are looking for an urban, modern place in the heart of the hip Palermo Hollywood in BA, Guido's penthouse is a great option. He was very easy to work with and always accommodating. And his recommendation of an Italian restaurant within walking distance could not have been better!! The full bathroom is well equipped and it was nice having a half bath downstairs. My husband, two adult children (son 25 yr and daughter 20 yr) stayed two nights in BA. The kids shared a bedroom with 2 twins and my husband I had had the master bedroom. Both were upstairs. 

We Ubered everywhere (except the Italian restaurant). One morning we grabbed a quick breakfast in the bakery just down stairs. 

The balconies were a lovely addition. The decor was modern. Although the place is not large, it worked great for us and the location makes you feel like you won't miss a thing in a city that is eclectic, welcoming and lively.

Guidos Wohnung in Palermo eignet sich hervorragend für einen Aufenthalt in Buenos Aires. Die Lage in dem hippen Viertel ist genial, mit dem Taxi ist man schnell in der Innenstadt. Wir haben die Wohnung sauber und in perfektem Zustand vorgefunden, auch die Kommunikation mit Guido war von Schnelligkeit und Freundlichkeit geprägt. Besonders schön: Die Aussicht von den Balkonen auf die Skyline der argentinischen Hauptstadt und der Gemeinschaftspool auf dem Dach, den wir eigentlich immer für uns hatten. Wir haben uns extrem wohlgefühlt - äußerst empfehlenswert!
Excelente apartamento! Não poderia ser melhor. O proprietário é atencioso e o apartamento é limpo, bem localizado, muito bem estruturado e confortável. Nota 10!

The apartment is bright, clean and comfortable. We stayed for 8 nights and it felt like home to our family of four on a visit from Ireland. It's in a safe location with easy access to restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets and bars and train stop is within walkable distance. Guido is a great host who provided us with local information which made our stay even more enjoyable. If we're lucky enough to return to Buenos Aires we would definitely stay here again.
Second time staying in Guidos place.  What can i say, its the best in Buenos Aires!  Close to everything, great neighborhood, amazing apartment.  Guido is a great host!

Another great stay in Guido's flat. It is just like the photos and the roof terrace is perfect for relaxing in the sun. The location is amazing, lots of cool bars, restaurants, cafes and close to Plaza Serrano. Guido was a great host, was very helpful with every step of the process. Definitely recommend staying here!
This beautiful apartment has it all and is located in a hip, charming neighborhood with tons of great restaurants and bars within easy walking distance.  I would highly recommend staying with Guido!
Very beautiful place with lots of sun. Excellent host.

Fantastic place to come and stay. The facilities are brill, the apartment beautiful and well looked after, the host were helpful and quick to communicate and the location was spot on.

This is a great choice whatever your plans, highly recommend (you won't be sorry)
Excellent spot and very nice penthouse. Incredible view of Buenos Aires from the balcony, lots of nice restaurants around the place, and Guido was awesome!
Guido is an excellent host. His attention is wonderful and his apartment is second to nothing. Love it!

Guido is an excellent host and was always quick to respond to emails/questions. Apartment was as pictured in the photos, no surprises. Many restaurants and bars within walking distance. Definitely recommend!
Great communication throughout and very nice welcome. The apartment was just as described and in a fantastic location. We had a great week here celebrating the New Year, thank you Guido!

This apartment is more or less flawless. You have everything you need for a comfortable and problem free stay, including refillable Subte card for the subway and several guide books. The view is great. Guido is an excellent host.

Guido was an excellent host. He was easy to reach and always addressed concerns or issues as quickly as possible. He was also kind enough to deliver some postcards that we left behind and did not have time to send ourselves. 
Guido's apartment is clean, modern and walking-distance to the restaurants and shops in the Palermo neighbourhood. 

A few small things would have bumped the 4 stars to 5 - the bathtub drain was not working very well and filled with water during showers (although we did not address with Guido directly on this), there could have been a few more basics (bar soap, paper towels, etc.)

Overall, a very nice, comfortable stay in BA at a reasonable price!
reviews.response:
Thank you Ivonne !  
The bath tub dran is now fixed, and drainig properly.

reviews.comments: Excellent apartment and area, Guido was the perfect host.

Guido was a wonderful host. . He organized a cab to the airport for us and helped us out with great recommendations.
Thanks a lot. :-) The appartment is beautiful, especially the view is more than stunning. We can totally recommend to stay there.

Guido est une personne à l'écoute de ses hôtes. 
C'est une personne qui est vraiment dans l'esprit d'airbnb. Ce n'est simplement pas faire de l'argent pour l'argent c'est aussi de la proximité sans l'intrusion. 
Je le recommande vivement. 
En ce qui concerne l'appartement tout était parfait. 
À bientôt Guido et un grand merci !!!!
Guido was great and helped us with any issues we had. Beautiful place to stay

Guido's place was a great home base to explore Buenos Aires. The apartment itself is modern and spacious. The three balconies allowed for great light and a nice space to hang out. It's located in a great area with easy walking access to shops and restaurants - we definitely felt as if we were living like locals.

Guido is a fantastic host who gave great advice on the neighborhood and clear communication about check in/out.
Guido's apartment is exactly as described, and all the great reviews tell the story. Thebook of suggested restaurants and activities was so helpful!

Guido has been an excellent and helpful host and we enjoyed our stay very much.
We have been four guests and the apartment offers everything you need. 
The neighbourhood, especially Parlermo Soho is probably the best area to stay in Buenos Aires. There are 100s of creative and great cafés and bars nearby.  
I would definitely stay at Guido's apartment again!
Guido could not have been more helpful or welcoming. Providing orange juice and coffee is a lovely touch. His apartment is wonderful and the view exceptional! Great location too.

This is a great place. Really nice decoration, two large bedrooms, nice view, good bed and shower, really quiet since its on the 4th floor. Elevator working fine, and a really friendly doorman on the building.

Location is perfect for what I was looking for (many, many good restaurants and bars in a few blocks, safe, and close enough to the subway to access the city center). Oh, there's a jewel of a bar just on the next door, kinda hipster (Palermo is a hipster neighborhood, btw) but really fun and with great craft beer.

Highly recommended!

Guido was very welcoming and available when we called him .We were out most of the time with our daughter who is studying in BA.
The apt is great, proximity to the city is 25mins by cab which is what we used when we were there.,
We ate at 3 restaurants ,all very good in Palermo  and Palermo Soho.
There are plenty of good restaurants within 10-15 min walk from the apt and ,good bakeries next door to the apt building .
Foi tudo perfeito. Guido foi muito atensioso e o apartamento é muito aconchegante, bem localizado, limpo e muito bem decorado
Great apartment, excellent host, fantastic location. This is a top shelf AirBnB. Huge value for money. We will be back!

Guido was an excellent host. The place is cozy and it is well located in one of the most chic neighborhood in the city. The recommendations that he leaves at the appartment was a good idea to walk around and to eat in Buenos Aires and know more and live the city as an authentic Argentine.

I would highly recommend to Guido and his appartment
Great neighborhood,  clean apartment,  comfortable,  everything is great.
Guido was very response and attentive to our requests. The apt was located conveniently, had all amenities we needed and we couldn't have asked for more. Recommend to all travelers.
Guido was amazing.  He helped us out on a last minute trip.  He accommodated us in every way and was a pleasant person to do business with.  I definitely recommend his business in the future.

We loved staying at Guido's pent house loft in the Palermo neighborhood!  Guido was very responsive prior to our arrival and greeted us with a tour of the loft.  Location was excellent with a wonderful Italian restaurant just a couple minutes from the loft and a craft beer bar located on the bottom level of the building.  We spent most of our time exploring Palermo neighborhood which was very safe.  Wifi inside the loft was excellent and there were converters for a couple of the outlets.   We will definitely be back!!

We had a great time at Guido's apartment. He was waiting for us at the door when we arrived late on a Friday night. He showed us around the apartment and made sure we knew how to use everything. The apartment is in a great location, it was easy to get a taxi to travel into the city center. It was nice at the end of the day to come back to a neighborhood. Guido left a guide for the area with several restaurants listed, we tried 3 of them and loved them all. The grocery store was within walking distance along a smaller market.  There is a cute little bar downstairs if you wanted to grab a quick drink and feel like you were a part of the neighborhood. We enjoyed all the balconies, which were great for breakfast or a glass of wine at the end of the day. The apartment was a great size for 3 friends, and the 1/2 bath downstairs made getting ready in the morning easy for everyone. Guido made us feel at home and checked in with us during our stay to make sure we had everything we needed. I would recommend the apartment for anyone looking for a relaxing spot in Buenos Aires
